name: Ball in hell
description:
This was made for a Bullet Hell Jam.

"Ball in hell" is a platfromer bullet hell game about slaying demons, who have sealed you in hell.Every 10 seconds entire hell will swap it grounds(that's the main problem, that will make you struggle(maybe)).

Controls:

Space, W - Jump

A, D - Walk 

S - Dash down

Z, Enter - interact

I am lazy to type some more stuff there, so just enjoy the game without any plot.
